summary: This mod will let you mute the dog sounds all together or just play them at a much quieter level
descriptionHtml:
Has this ever happened to you:
He could feel the force behind the lid as he opened the chest. A spirit twice as large rose over him and said \"All my treasures shall be yours now for freeing me. Take this key and go to the BARK..BARK...BARK.BARK.BARK.BARK..HUH.HUH.HUH.HUH\" he watched as the spirit disappeared forever never to be seen or heard from again.

Or how about this:
During the quest A Daedra\'s Best Friend, You are forced to listen to 500 - 800 BARKS from Barbas, man\'s best fiend uh friend.

All that aside this mod will let you mute the dog sounds all together or just play them at a much quieter level. Just choose one download. Whichever one you want.



[color=yellow]Check Out My Other Mods[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15567]Stop The Dark Brotherhood Forever Quest From Returning[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15693]Breezehome Extra Light[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17981]Whiterun Repaired Plus[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18158]Solitude Repaired[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18234]Windhelm Repaired[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18526]Civil War Repairs[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18280]No Warning[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16663]Muffle Your Horse[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17309]Muffle The Bards[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17641]Muffle The Nirnroot[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17695]Muffle Heimskr - The Preacher in Whiterun[/url]


[size=5][color=red]- Have Fun -[/color][/size]
author: MightyMalts
